content.text: I love all kinds of food, but if I had to choose just one, I'd probably say pizza.
I've never met a person who doesn't like pizza! What kind of pizza do you like best?
My favourite kind of pizza is pepperoni, but I also love cheese pizza.
Same! I love the combination of pepperoni and cheese. What is your favourite kind of music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favourite is probably rock.
I love rock music too! What are some of your favourite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but some of my favourites are Green Day, Metallica, and Guns N' Roses.
Those are all great bands! I love Green Day and Metallica. I've never been a big fan of Guns N' Roses, but I can appreciate their music.
Yeah, they're not for everyone. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go out with my friends, play video games, and watch sports. I also like to go to the gym and work out.
Those all sound like fun activities! I love going out with my friends too, and I also like to play video games. I don't really watch sports, but I do enjoy going to the gym and working out.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
Yeah, it does! We should definitely hang out sometime.
That would be great! I'm free this weekend if you want to do something.
I'm free too! We could go out to dinner or see a movie.
That sounds like a plan! I'll text you later to figure out the details
